description: Detects when a person begins to use subtle suggestions, guilt, or emotional nudging to influence another without direct consent or boundary respect. Flags soft coercion.

variables.S(t): Suggestion intensity (framing, leading questions, implied pressure)
variables.N(t): Narrative leverage (guilt, flattery, fear, future promises)
variables.B(t): Boundary clarity (direct consent, openness to disagreement)
